title: Find your favourite past login screens!

replies.body: Vel Koz {{champion:161}} and dj sona concussive{{champion:37}}
urf 2014
Where's the option to choose what Login screen we want? it's a bit overdue. I'd like to set mine to Vi or Jinx.

Download LSI and it can change it for you, it also does a whole lot of other cool stuff.

I want to set my log in as glorious shurima.
Now how does one do this?
If you download LSI it lets you change it to whichever theme you want :) I'm using it with the {{champion:412}} theme now
